title: Riot, please change dynamic queue
body:
First of all, i want the normal soloQ back. Dynamic queue is a recipe for salt and harrassment, 
_If i want to play soloQ, why risk being matched with a team that are all premades but myself._

It destroyes the meaning of ranked teams, if people want to play soloQ with 3-4 people, make a different queue type. It is unfair to be ranking people in the same way, who play soloQ or technically ranked 5s at the same time. It devalues the ranked system. As a keen extrovert, i am quite happy playing by myself. I have 3 friends who i play with sometimes, but if i am being judged by my rank with other people who were originally in bronze but got taken up by dynamic queue, there is no point in me playing this game. And worst of all, Gold, Platinum and Diamond are all going to become devalued, my gold border is going to mean nothing if people cant discern whether i earned it by myself, or with 4 other people. I want the old soloQ back, or atleast another ranked queue. It is unfair on those who want to play by themselves. Riot hasnt thought about the ranked system, they have thought about player enjoyment. And making the game have more player enjoyment (for some people) at the expense of the ranking system is ultimately going to fall back. Because for a lot of people _The ranked system IS player enjoyment_.

I have been liking riots changes to certain champs, i have liked their decisions of balancing everything for season 6. But if the new ranked system continues to devalue my rank that i worked hard for _By Myself_, then there wont be much point in me being here anymore.

Riot, you have taken many steps forward lately
but this is a step backward

There is going to be a separate ranked solo Q introduced later on. The ranked Solo Q will affect your dynamic queue rating but dynamic queue will not affect your solo Q rating.

Everyone just chill out it hasn't even been live for 24 hours on OCE.

i am sick of getting a 4 stack premade in this crap dynamic queue if i wanted to do that i would have played the rank 5 system its so crap that all i get is idiots that troll or people that abuse in game
yeah i think they made a huge mistake with this. I wish they kept the same champ select too.
